summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx for shipping services provided to NYSG LLC. It details various charges for shipments made in June 2005, including transportation and fuel surcharges, and includes specific shipment details such as pickup dates and delivery addresses.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated June 17, 2005, and details charges totaling $25.69.
Multiple shipments were picked up by NYSG LLC on June 13 and June 14, 2005.
The invoice includes specific details about transportation and fuel surcharges applied to the shipments.
Lauren Bill Hammond and Paul Burkhardt are identified as senders for the shipments.
Wendy Swf is mentioned as a recipient for one of the shipments.
